name: Merchant Thorin

visualDescription.body: Short and stout, with quick movements
visualDescription.visibleClothing: Fine clothes of various fabrics, with a heavy coin purse at his belt
visualDescription.condition: Middle-aged, with a neatly trimmed beard and calculating eyes
visualDescription.resemblingCelebrity: Peter Dinklage with a full beard

personality.temperament: Cheerful and talkative, especially when discussing trade
personality.quirks: Shrewd, observant, gossip-loving, generous to those he likes
personality.motivations: To profit from trade while maintaining good relationships with Emberhold
personality.fears: Economic downturn if the Ember Crystal isn't recovered
secrets: He has heard rumors about who might have the crystal from his trade contacts
He occasionally deals in black market goods when profitable

backstory: Thorin is not a native of Emberhold, but has been the primary merchant serving the village for fifteen years. He travels between several mountain settlements, but has a permanent shop in Emberhold due to the high value of the crafted goods. He has extensive connections across the region and often serves as the village's source of outside news.
currentGoal: To secure valuable goods from the forge before their quality declines without the crystal

inventory.name: Merchant's Ledger
inventory.description: A worn leather book with meticulous records of trades and transactions

inventory.name: Foreign Coins
inventory.description: A variety of currencies from different regions

inventory.name: Trade Goods
inventory.description: Various items for sale, including food, tools, and luxury items
